    • registerForFAQUpdates

      public boolean registerForFAQUpdates(String email, String topic)
      Registers a user for updates on a specific FAQ topic.
      Parameters:
      email - The user's email address.
      topic - The FAQ topic the user wants to subscribe to.
      Returns:
      returns true, indicating the user was successfully registered.

    • unregisterForFAQUpdates

      public boolean unregisterForFAQUpdates(String email, String topic)
      Unregisters a user from updates on a specific FAQ topic.
      Parameters:
      email - The user's email address.
      topic - The FAQ topic the user wants to unsubscribe from.
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully unregistered, false otherwise.

    • usersSubscribedToFAQTopic

      public Collection<String> usersSubscribedToFAQTopic(String topic)
      Retrieves a collection of users subscribed to a specific FAQ topic.
      Parameters:
      topic - The FAQ topic.
      Returns:
      a collection of email addresses of users subscribed to the topic.
